Text: How often should auto-save saves. Game default: 10
How many auto-saves should be kept. Game default: 3
When a weather warning is issued, make an extra save named 'weatherwarning.save' that is only overwritten by the next cycle's warning. This save is not counted towards the save count.
Show a warning some time before the game autosaves. This is useful for players who dislike game stuttering on autosave.
